title: Chemical genetic approaches to identifying protein kinase substrates
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The data provided several collaborations which are on going and a variety of publications Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
findingsText: Validation of protein kinase chemical genetics, synthesis of a variety of nucleotide analogues and establishment of a selective system for protein kinase substrate identification Identification of protein kinase substrates helps to delineate signalling pathways whose disruption may be therapeutically relevant Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
